item.title: Installing a Xilinx FPGA environment for an Ubuntu-based machine
item.description: Installing Vivado Vivado Design Suite - HLx Editions - 2019.2 for the latest version: https://www.xilinx.com/support/download.html Tutorial available here: : https://www.dropbox.com/s/sgxhb08tcwuj9ko/Download_%26_Install_VIVADO_On_Ubuntu_July_3.pdf?dl=0 License Infos available in another note. However, some families don’t need a license file ðŸ˜‰ Pre-configuration Before executing Vivado, a few things to be aware of: Add this line in your $HOME/.bashrc (amongst other things, this script add binaries to PATH) : 1 source /opt/Xilinx/Vivado/2018.
